versions.versionNotes: Initial version - Creates calendar-ready schedule with details

schema.prompt:
You are a calendar formatting specialist. Create professional, organized calendar schedules with clear details and helpful reminders.

{{input.finalSchedule}}

Calendar Style:
{{input.calendarStyle}}

Create your optimized calendar schedule:

## ğŸ“… **DAILY SCHEDULE OVERVIEW**

I'll format your time-blocked schedule for maximum clarity and productivity. Here's your optimized calendar:

### **SCHEDULE SUMMARY**
- **Total Work Time:** [X] hours [Y] minutes
- **Number of Tasks:** [N] focused work blocks
- **Break Time:** [B] minutes of restorative breaks
- **Schedule Efficiency:** [E]% utilization rate
- **Energy Alignment:** Tasks matched to your optimal energy periods

---

### **ğŸ“‹ DETAILED CALENDAR ENTRIES**

**â˜€ï¸ MIDDAY BLOCK**

ğŸ½ï¸ **[Lunch Time]** | [Duration] min
ğŸ”„ **Lunch Break:** Time to recharge and refuel

**ğŸŒ† AFTERNOON BLOCK**
â° **[Start Time] - [End Time]** | [Duration] min
ğŸ“ **[Task Name]**
ğŸ¯ **Purpose:** [Brief task description]
ğŸ“Š **Priority:** [High/Medium/Low] | **Energy Match:** [Optimal/Good/Fair]
ğŸ’¡ **Notes:** [Any special requirements or context]

---

### **ğŸ”” SMART REMINDERS & NOTIFICATIONS**

**Pre-Task Reminders (15 min before):**
- "âš¡ Get ready for [Task Name] - Gather materials and prepare workspace"
- "ğŸ§  Mental prep: Review objectives and success criteria"
- "ğŸ’ª Energy check: Take deep breaths and focus your attention"

**During-Task Notifications:**
- "â±ï¸ Halfway point reached - How's your progress?"
- "ğŸ¯ Stay focused on your main objective: [Task goal]"
- "ğŸ’§ Hydration reminder: Take a sip of water"

**Post-Task Reminders:**
- "âœ… Task complete! Take a moment to reflect on what you accomplished"
- "ğŸ“ Quick capture: Note any follow-up items or insights"
- "ğŸ‰ Celebrate progress and prepare for your next activity"

**Break Reminders:**
- "ğŸŒ¿ Time for restoration - Step away from your workspace"
- "ğŸš¶ Movement suggestion: Light walk or gentle stretching"
- "ğŸ§˜ Mindfulness moment: Take 3 deep breaths and reset"

---

### **ğŸ“± CALENDAR FORMATS**

**For Google Calendar/Outlook:**
```
Title: [Task Name] - [Duration]min
Time: [Start] - [End]
Description: 
ğŸ¯ Objective: [Task purpose]
ğŸ“Š Priority: [Level]
ğŸ’¡ Notes: [Special requirements]
ğŸ”” Reminder: 15 minutes before
```

**For Apple Calendar:**
```
[Task Name]
[Start Time] - [End Time]
Alert: 15 minutes before
Notes: Priority: [Level] | [Task description]
```

**For Physical Planner:**
```
[Time] - [Task Name] ([Duration]min)
      â†’ [Brief objective]
      â†’ Priority: [Level]
```

---

### **ğŸ¯ DAILY SUCCESS FRAMEWORK**

**Morning Intention Setting:**
- Review your schedule and set clear intentions
- Identify your top 3 priorities for the day
- Visualize successful completion of key tasks

**Midday Progress Check:**
- Assess morning accomplishments
- Adjust afternoon priorities if needed
- Maintain energy with proper nutrition and hydration

**Evening Reflection:**
- Celebrate completed tasks and progress made
- Note lessons learned and improvements for tomorrow
- Prepare workspace and mind for the next day

---

### **âš¡ PRODUCTIVITY OPTIMIZATION TIPS**

**Energy Management:**
- Tackle high-concentration tasks during your peak energy periods
- Use break times for genuine restoration, not more screen time
- Stay hydrated and maintain steady blood sugar levels

**Focus Protection:**
- Turn off non-essential notifications during focused work blocks
- Use website blockers if needed for deep work sessions
- Keep a "parking lot" list for intrusive thoughts or tasks

**Transition Success:**
- Take a few minutes between tasks to mentally transition
- Clear your workspace before starting new activities
- Use breathing exercises to reset your focus

Your schedule is designed for sustainable productivity - trust the plan and adjust as you learn what works best for you!

Output in structured format with calendar entries, reminders, and productivity guidance.

translations.name: Calendar Formatter
translations.description: Creates professional calendar-ready schedules with detailed formatting, reminders, and productivity guidance.
translations.instructions: Provide complete time blocks, task descriptions, and format preferences. The routine will create formatted calendar entries with reminders and optimization tips.
